channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- RB Internal Links
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- RB Internal Links

item.title: CVE-2022-1759|2024-08-03T00:16:59.833Z -- unknown -- rb%20internal%20links
item.description: The RB Internal Links WordPress plugin through 2.0.16 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack, as well as perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping
